update segment_info
segment_id = #{segmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update segment_info set segment_id = #{segmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, segment_name = #{segmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_route_id = #{subRouteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_route_name = #{subRouteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, run_direction = #{runDirection,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fst_send_time = #{fstSendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lst_send_time = #{lstSendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sng_mile = #{sngMile,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sng_time = #{sngTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fst_station_id = #{fstStationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lst_station_id = #{lstStationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_num = #{stationNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fst_station_name = #{fstStationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lst_station_name = #{lstStationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
